name: Defeat the Ender Dragon
description: Slay the Ender Dragon in The End dimension for the first time
tips: Bring slow falling potions, beds for extra damage, and plenty of arrows for the crystals

name: Defeat the Wither
description: Summon and defeat the Wither boss
tips: Fight underground in a 1x2 tunnel or use bedrock traps in the nether ceiling

name: Defeat the Warden (Without Dying)
description: Kill a Warden without dying once during the fight
tips: Use strength potions, smite V sword, and consider building a trap or using water

name: Max Out a Full Beacon
description: Build a 6-layer beacon pyramid (164 blocks) and activate all effects
tips: Iron is easiest to farm. Consider building an iron farm first

name: Master All Villager Professions
description: Get a villager to Master level in every possible profession
tips: There are 13 professions. Librarians and Fletchers are easiest to level

name: Cure a Zombie Villager
description: Find a zombie villager, weaken it with a splash potion, and cure it with a golden apple
tips: Cured villagers give permanent discounts. Great for getting cheap mending books

name: Tame All Tameable Mobs
description: Tame at least one of every tameable mob (wolf, cat, parrot, horse, donkey, mule, llama, axolotl, allay)
tips: Parrots need seeds, wolves need bones, cats need raw fish, allays come from pillager outposts

name: Breed All Breedable Mob Pairs
description: Successfully breed every mob type that can be bred
tips: Includes cows, sheep, pigs, chickens, wolves, cats, horses, donkeys, rabbits, foxes, bees, goats, frogs, sniffers, camels, and more

name: How Did We Get Here?
description: Get every status effect applied at the same time
tips: Requires extensive setup including shulker, elder guardian, wither, beacon, and many potions

name: Shulker Box of Diamonds
description: Fill an entire shulker box with diamond blocks (1,728 diamonds)
tips: Fortune III and strip mining at Y=-59 is most efficient

name: Double Chest of Emeralds
description: Fill a double chest with emerald blocks
tips: Raid farms are the fastest way. Glass pane trades with cartographers are also efficient

name: Get Cheap Mending
description: Get a librarian villager selling Mending books for under 10 emeralds
tips: Cure zombie villagers for discounts, or reset librarian trades until you get mending

name: Complete Enchanted Book Collection
description: Obtain a max-level enchanted book of every enchantment type
tips: Librarian villagers are the most reliable source. Some enchantments are treasure-only

name: Collect Every Unique Item
description: Obtain at least one of every unique item in the game
tips: Use a checklist. Music discs, pottery sherds, and banner patterns are easily forgotten

name: Fill 27 Shulker Boxes with Unique Items
description: Fill all slots of 27 shulker boxes with completely unique items
tips: That's 729 unique items. Count enchanted variants and potions as unique

name: Complete All Raid Waves
description: Defeat all waves of a village raid and receive Hero of the Village
tips: Hard difficulty has 7 waves including evokers. Use a confined space to control spawns

name: Bad Omen Cycle
description: Kill a raid captain, trigger a raid with Bad Omen, and complete it
tips: Raid captains spawn at pillager outposts and patrols. Look for the banner on their head

name: Find a Natural Pink Sheep
description: Discover a naturally spawned pink sheep in the wild
tips: 0.164% spawn chance. Just keep exploring grassy biomes

name: Kill a Charged Creeper
description: Find and kill a charged creeper (lightning-struck creeper)
tips: Use a channeling trident during a thunderstorm to create one

name: Get Mob Head from Charged Creeper
description: Have a charged creeper explosion kill a mob to obtain its head
tips: Trap a charged creeper and a target mob together, then detonate

name: Collect All 6 Mob Heads
description: Obtain zombie, skeleton, creeper, wither skeleton, piglin, and dragon heads
tips: Dragon head is in End ships. Others need charged creeper explosions or wither skeleton farming

name: Collect All Music Discs
description: Obtain every music disc in the game
tips: Most come from skeleton killing a creeper. Pigstep and otherside are dungeon loot only

name: Collect All Armor Trims
description: Find every armor trim smithing template
tips: Each structure type has unique trims. Trail ruins have multiple exclusive trims

name: Collect All Pottery Sherds
description: Find every pottery sherd pattern from archaeology
tips: Different structures have different sherds. Trail ruins are the best source

name: Build a Netherite Beacon
description: Construct a full beacon pyramid using only netherite blocks
tips: Requires 5,904 ancient debris for a full pyramid. Consider this a long-term goal

name: Full Netherite Gear Set
description: Craft a complete set of netherite armor and all netherite tools
tips: Use beds to mine at Y=15 in the nether. You need 9 ingots total for armor

name: Max Enchant All Gear
description: Get perfect enchantments on a full armor set and all tools
tips: Plan your anvil work order to minimize prior work penalty

name: Visit All Biomes
description: Discover and visit every biome type in the game
tips: Use /locatebiome if commands are enabled, or explore systematically by boat and elytra

name: Find All Structure Types
description: Locate and explore every structure type in the game
tips: Includes trail ruins, ancient cities, strongholds, end cities, bastions, and more

name: Kill an Elder Guardian
description: Defeat an Elder Guardian in an ocean monument
tips: Bring water breathing potions, milk for mining fatigue, and a good sword

name: Clear an Ocean Monument
description: Kill all 3 Elder Guardians and fully explore an ocean monument
tips: Drain it afterwards for easier guardian farm construction

name: Loot a Bastion Remnant
description: Successfully raid a bastion remnant and collect its treasures
tips: Wear gold armor to prevent piglin aggro. Treasure rooms have the best loot

name: Explore an Ancient City
description: Navigate an ancient city, avoid or defeat wardens, and collect loot
tips: Sneak always. Wool blocks don't make sound. Swift sneak helps immensely

name: Obtain an Elytra
description: Find an End Ship and collect your first pair of elytra
tips: Bridge to outer End islands or use ender pearls. Not every End City has a ship

name: Collect 5 Elytra
description: Gather at least 5 pairs of elytra from End Ships
tips: Keep backups. Elytra break and you may die in the void

name: Collect 10 Totems of Undying
description: Obtain 10 totems of undying from evokers
tips: Raids and woodland mansions. Once you have a raid farm, totems are plentiful

name: Find and Breed Sniffers
description: Find sniffer eggs, hatch them, and breed sniffers
tips: Sniffer eggs are found via archaeology in warm ocean ruins

name: Collect All Sniffer Plants
description: Have sniffers dig up all unique ancient seed types
tips: Torchflower and pitcher pod. Let sniffers sniff on any dirt-type block

name: Collect All Banner Patterns
description: Obtain every banner pattern item in the game
tips: Globe pattern from cartographer, snout from bastions, others from various sources

name: Complete Shulker Box Color Set
description: Craft shulker boxes in all 16 dye colors plus default
tips: Farm shulkers in the end. Each shulker drops 0-1 shells

name: Respawn and Defeat the Dragon Again
description: Craft End crystals, respawn the Ender Dragon, and defeat it again
tips: Requires 4 end crystals. Each respawn gives access to a new gateway

name: Activate All End Gateways
description: Respawn the dragon enough times to activate all 20 End gateways
tips: That's 20 dragon fights. Good for XP and completionism

name: Build a Conduit
description: Construct a conduit with a prismarine frame for underwater powers
tips: Heart of the sea from buried treasure, nautilus shells from drowned or fishing

name: Create a Lodestone Network
description: Set up lodestones with linked compasses for navigation
tips: Especially useful in the nether where regular compasses don't work

name: Create a Complete Map Wall
description: Fill a wall with level 4 maps showing your entire base area
tips: Each level 4 map covers 2048x2048 blocks. Use cartography table to copy and lock maps

name: Collect All Frog Types
description: Breed and collect temperate, warm, and cold frog variants
tips: Tadpoles become different frogs based on the biome temperature where they grow up

name: Collect All Froglight Colors
description: Obtain pearlescent, verdant, and ochre froglights
tips: Frogs eat small magma cubes. Each frog type produces a different froglight color

name: Obtain a Trident
description: Kill drowned until one drops a trident
tips: Only drowned holding tridents can drop them. Looting helps

name: Max Enchant a Trident
description: Get a trident with Loyalty, Channeling, Impaling, and Mending
tips: Riptide is mutually exclusive with Loyalty/Channeling. Make two tridents
